name: Rather Serious Crime 2
description:
You are a tough crimeman, go out into the lush open world and commit crime. Heading to a payphone and taking jobs from is surely the quickest way up the crime ladder, but AT WHAT COST?

Controls:

Up, Left, Down, Right: W, A, S, D

Shoot: Aim with mouse and click

Use Phone, Car, Advance Mission Dialog: F

Made for: THE RR CASSETTE 50 ONE SCREEN REMAKE MINI COMPETITION
